Armor Merchant Alisha:

Ah, so you are about the request sent by the Adventurer Helpers. Yes, I do indeed have an item in need of delivering.
I need you to delievring this letter to Grand Magister Tifaren at the Mystic Guild here in Rune Township. A word of warning, do not read the contents of this letter... it could end poorly for you. Tifaren should be able to reward you upon delivery if this letter.
